段: 你那通怨慼怨慼，我騙你戇戇踅，你那通誤會誤會，無予我辯解的機會。好啦你若赫好款，存心欲佮我扯，再會就再會，那有啥關係那有啥關係。毋是我騙你是你來違背，我欲原諒你你又無反悔你又無反悔，又欲叫我又欲叫我擔起這條罪。

li2 na2 thang oan3-chheh oan3-chheh, goa2 phian3 li2 gong7-gong7 seh8, li2 na2 thang gou7-hoe7 gou7-hoe7, bo5 hou7 goa2 pian7-kai2 e5 ki-hoe7. ho2--lah li2 na7 hiah ho2-khoan2, chun5-sim beh kah goa2 chhe3, chai3-hoe7 chiu7 chai3-hoe7, na2 u7 siann2 koan-he7 na2 u7 siann2 koan-he7. m7 si7 goa2 phian3 li2 si7 li2 lai5 ui5-poe7, goa2 beh goan5-liong7 li2 li2 iu7 bo5 hoan2-hoe2 li2 iu7 bo5 hoan2-hoe2, iu7 beh kio3 goa2 iu7 beh kio3 goa2 tann khi2 chit tiau5 choe7.
你那通怨慼怨慼，我騙你戇戇踅，你那通誤會誤會，無予我辯解的機會。好啦你若赫好款，存心欲佮我扯，再會就再會，那有啥關係那有啥關係。毋是我騙你是你來違背，我欲原諒你你又無反悔你又無反悔，又欲叫我又欲叫我擔起這條罪。

li2 na2 thang oan3-chheh oan3-chheh, goa2 phian3 li2 gong7-gong7 seh8, li2 na2 thang gou7-hoe7 gou7-hoe7, bo5 hou7 goa2 pian7-kai2 e5 ki-hoe7. ho2--lah li2 na7 hiah ho2-khoan2, chun5-sim beh kah goa2 chhe3, chai3-hoe7 chiu7 chai3-hoe7, na2 u7 siann2 koan-he7 na2 u7 siann2 koan-he7. m7 si7 goa2 phian3 li2 si7 li2 lai5 ui5-poe7, goa2 beh goan5-liong7 li2 li2 iu7 bo5 hoan2-hoe2 li2 iu7 bo5 hoan2-hoe2, iu7 beh kio3 goa2 iu7 beh kio3 goa2 tann khi2 chit tiau5 choe7.
好啦你若赫好款，存心欲佮我扯，再會就再會，那有啥關係那有啥關係。毋是我騙你是你來違背，我欲原諒你你又無反悔你又無反悔，又欲叫我又欲叫我擔起這條罪。

ho2--lah li2 na7 hiah ho2-khoan2, chun5-sim beh kah goa2 chhe3, chai3-hoe7 chiu7 chai3-hoe7, na2 u7 siann2 koan-he7 na2 u7 siann2 koan-he7. m7 si7 goa2 phian3 li2 si7 li2 lai5 ui5-poe7, goa2 beh goan5-liong7 li2 li2 iu7 bo5 hoan2-hoe2 li2 iu7 bo5 hoan2-hoe2, iu7 beh kio3 goa2 iu7 beh kio3 goa2 tann khi2 chit tiau5 choe7.
是你袂記得抑是你故意，袂記回航的日子，予我暝日等，予我暝日望，予我為你哭過一暗又一暗。
si7 li2 be7-ki3-tit iah8 si7 li2 kou3-i3, be7 ki3 hoe5-hang5 e5 jit8-chi2, hou7 goa2 me5-jit8 tan2, hou7 goa2 me5-jit8 bang7, hou7 goa2 ui7 li2 khau3 koe3 chit8 am3 iu7 chit8 am3.
海風呀心愛的人怎樣無回航，海風呀請你傳達阮的心願，毋通閣予我等，毋通予我望，毋通予我哭過一暗又一暗。

hai2-hong ia sim-ai3 e5 lang5 chainn2-iunn7 bo5 hoe5-hang5, hai2-hong ia chhiann2 li2 thoan5-tat8 goan2 e5 sim-goan7, m7 thang koh hou7 goa2 tan2, m7 thang hou7 goa2 bang7, m7 thang hou7 goa2 khau3 koe3 chit8 am3 iu7 chit8 am3.
是你袂記得抑是你故意，袂記回航的日子，予我暝日等，予我暝日望，予我為你哭過一暗又一暗。
si7 li2 be7-ki3-tit iah8 si7 li2 kou3-i3, be7 ki3 hoe5-hang5 e5 jit8-chi2, hou7 goa2 me5-jit8 tan2, hou7 goa2 me5-jit8 bang7, hou7 goa2 ui7 li2 khau3 koe3 chit8 am3 iu7 chit8 am3.

hai2-hong ia sim-ai3 e5 lang5 chainn2-iunn7 bo5 hoe5-hang5, hai2-hong ia chhiann2 li2 thoan5-tat8 goan2 e5 sim-goan7, m7 thang koh hou7 goa2 tan2, m7 thang hou7 goa2 bang7, m7 thang hou7 goa2 khau3 koe3 chit8 am3 iu7 chit8 am3.
海風呀心愛的人怎樣無回航，海風呀請你傳達阮的心願，毋通閣予我等，毋通予我望，毋通予我哭過一暗又一暗。

hai2-hong ia sim-ai3 e5 lang5 chainn2-iunn7 bo5 hoe5-hang5, hai2-hong ia chhiann2 li2 thoan5-tat8 goan2 e5 sim-goan7, m7 thang koh hou7 goa2 tan2, m7 thang hou7 goa2 bang7, m7 thang hou7 goa2 khau3 koe3 chit8 am3 iu7 chit8 am3.
你為啥物啉雄酒，為何借酒來解愁，燒酒若會解憂愁，世間就無怨嘆的理由，啊！勸你有事好好想，該來就會來，該去的免強求，何必心憂愁，任何失敗當做是研究，心肝就袂結規毬。

li2 ui7-siann2-mih8 lim hiong5-chiu2, ui7-ho5 chioh chiu2 lai5 kai2 chhiu5, sio-chiu2 na7 e7 kai2 iu-chhiu5, se3-kan chiu7 bo5 oan3-than3 e5 li2-iu5, ah! khng3 li2 u7 su7 ho2-ho2 siunn7, kai lai5 chiu7 e7 lai5, kai khi3 e5 bian2 kiong5-kiu5, ho5-pit sim iu-chhiu5, jim7-ho5 sit-pai7 tong3-cho3 si7 gian2-kiu3, sim-koann chiu7 boe7 kiat kui-kiu5.
你為啥物啉雄酒，為何借酒來解愁，燒酒若會解憂愁，世間就無怨嘆的理由，啊！勸你有事好好想，該來就會來，該去的免強求，何必心憂愁，任何失敗當做是研究，心肝就袂結規毬。

li2 ui7-siann2-mih8 lim hiong5-chiu2, ui7-ho5 chioh chiu2 lai5 kai2 chhiu5, sio-chiu2 na7 e7 kai2 iu-chhiu5, se3-kan chiu7 bo5 oan3-than3 e5 li2-iu5, ah! khng3 li2 u7 su7 ho2-ho2 siunn7, kai lai5 chiu7 e7 lai5, kai khi3 e5 bian2 kiong5-kiu5, ho5-pit sim iu-chhiu5, jim7-ho5 sit-pai7 tong3-cho3 si7 gian2-kiu3, sim-koann chiu7 boe7 kiat kui-kiu5.
啊！勸你有事好好想，該來就會來，該去的免強求，何必心憂愁，任何失敗當做是研究，心肝就袂結規毬。
ah! khng3 li2 u7 su7 ho2-ho2 siunn7, kai lai5 chiu7 e7 lai5, kai khi3 e5 bian2 kiong5-kiu5, ho5-pit sim iu-chhiu5, jim7-ho5 sit-pai7 tong3-cho3 si7 gian2-kiu3, sim-koann chiu7 boe7 kiat kui-kiu5.
無情人間，有情的人茫茫情海，想欲回頭實在困難，今夜的樓窗猶原等無人，為何那會對你即癡戀，想欲來離開已經太慢。

bo5 cheng5 jin5-kan, u7 cheng5 e5 lang5 bong5-bong5 cheng5-hai2, siunn7 beh hoe5-thau5 sit8-chai7 khun3-lan5, kim-ia7 e5 lau5-thang iu5-goan5 tan2 bo5 lang5, ui7-ho5 na2 e7 tui3 li2 chiah chhi-loan5, siunn7 beh lai5 li7-khui i2-keng thai3 ban7.
活佇失去你的世界我猶有啥物希望，我愛你愛你愛甲心肝寒，阮心內心內痛疼，敢講你毋知半項？佇無情無愛無夢的世間，千萬毋通來將阮放。

oah8 ti7 sit-khi3 li2 e5 se3-kai3 goa2 iau2 u7 siann2-mih8 hi-bong7, goa2 ai3 li2 ai3 li2 ai3 kah sim-koann koann5, gun2 sim-lai7 sim-lai7 thiann3-thang3, kam2 kong2 li2 m7 chai poann3 hang7? ti7 bo5 cheng5 bo5 ai3 bo5 bang7 e5 se3-kan, chhian-ban7 m7 thang lai5 chiong goan2 pang3.
情緣薄，行過的路阮已經完全尋無你的腳步，窗外無風，天頂也無落雨，只有思念你的寂寞，在阮的心中，愛情由甜變做苦，行未完坎坷的路。

cheng5-ian5 poh8, kiann5-koe3 e5 lou7 goan2 i2-keng oan5-choan5 chhoe7 bo5 li2 e5 kha-pou7, thang-goa7 bo5 hong, thinn-teng2 ia7 bo5 loh8-hou7, chi2-u7 su-liam7 li2 e5 chek8-bok8, chai7 goan2 e5 sim-tiong, ai3-cheng5 iu5 tinn pinn3-choe3 khou2, kiann5 boe7 oan5 kham-khiat e5 lou7.
閣想起，已經是幾落年，完全改變的過去，你的相片是思念的安慰，心情也是一片稀微，若是想起你，又是無聊的暗暝，今夜又閣睏未去。

koh siunn7-khi2, i2-keng si7 kui2-loh8 ni5, oan5-choan5 kai2-pian3 e5 koe3-khi3, li2 e5 siong3-phinn3 si7 su-liam7 e5 an-ui3, sim-cheng5 ia7 si7 chit8 phinn3 hi-bi5, na7 si7 siunn7-khi2 li2, iu7 si7 bo5-liau5 e5 am3-mi5, kim-ia7 iu7 koh khun3 be7 khi3.
毋想你毋想你，毋通予阮想起你，自從離開阮的身邊，伊是怎樣來對待你，我愛你，我愛你，永遠袂當放袂記，夢中的人毋知敢有機會閣再相見。

m7 siunn7 li2 m7 siunn7 li2, m7 thang hou7 gun2 siunn7-khi2 li2, chu7-chiong5 li7-khui goan2 e5 sin-pinn, i si7 chainn2-iunn7 lai5 tui3-thai7 li2, goa2 ai3 li2, goa2 ai3 li2, eng2-oan2 boe7 tang3 pang3 boe7 ki3, bang7-tiong e5 lang5 m7 chai kam2 u7 ki-hoe7 koh chai3 sio-kian3.
是你欲家己來離開我，毋通講我無情放捨你，親像你這个無情的男性，離開我毋通閣轉來膏膏纏。因為你違背我，無講怎樣做你去，害我一時險險想袂開。堅強的女性提出勇氣來，啊！毋想伊毋想伊毋想伊毋想伊，永遠永遠毋想伊。

si7 li2 beh ka-ki7 lai5 li7-khui goa2, m7 thang kong2 goa2 bo5 cheng5 pang3-sak li2, chhin-chhiunn7 li2 chit e5 bo5-cheng5 e5 lam5-seng3, li7-khui goa2 m7 thang koh tng2 lai5 ko-ko tinn5. in-ui7 li2 ui5-poe7 goa2, bo5 kong2 chainn2-iunn7 choe3 li2 khi3, hai7 goa2 chit8-si5 hiam2-hiam2 siunn7 boe7 khui. kian-kiong5 e5 lu2-seng3 theh8-chhut iong2-khi3 lai5, ah! m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 m7 siunn7 i.
是你欲家己來離開我，毋通講我無情放捨你，親像你這个無情的男性，離開我毋通閣轉來膏膏纏。因為你違背我，無講怎樣做你去，害我一時險險想袂開。堅強的女性提出勇氣來，啊！毋想伊毋想伊毋想伊毋想伊，永遠永遠毋想伊。

si7 li2 beh ka-ki7 lai5 li7-khui goa2, m7 thang kong2 goa2 bo5 cheng5 pang3-sak li2, chhin-chhiunn7 li2 chit e5 bo5-cheng5 e5 lam5-seng3, li7-khui goa2 m7 thang koh tng2 lai5 ko-ko tinn5. in-ui7 li2 ui5-poe7 goa2, bo5 kong2 chainn2-iunn7 choe3 li2 khi3, hai7 goa2 chit8-si5 hiam2-hiam2 siunn7 boe7 khui. kian-kiong5 e5 lu2-seng3 theh8-chhut iong2-khi3 lai5, ah! m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 m7 siunn7 i.
因為你違背我，無講怎樣做你去，害我一時險險想袂開。堅強的女性提出勇氣來，啊！毋想伊毋想伊毋想伊毋想伊，永遠永遠毋想伊。

in-ui7 li2 ui5-poe7 goa2, bo5 kong2 chainn2-iunn7 choe3 li2 khi3, hai7 goa2 chit8-si5 hiam2-hiam2 siunn7 boe7 khui. kian-kiong5 e5 lu2-seng3 theh8-chhut iong2-khi3 lai5, ah! m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i m7 siunn7 i, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 m7 siunn7 i.
春風吹花清芳，予阮想起心愛的人，彼日雙人情意重，如今分西東。毋管環境變啥款，一片真情毋願放，黃昏夕陽照紗窗，等待也是你一人。

chhun-hong chhoe hoe chheng-phang, hou7 gun2 siunn7-khi2 sim-ai3 e5 lang5, hit jit8 siang-lang5 cheng5-i3 tang7, ju5-kim hun sai tong. m7-koan2 khoan5-keng2 pian3 siann2-khoan2, it phian3 chin-cheng5 m7 goan7 pang3, hong5-hun sek8-iong5 chiau3 se-thang, tan2-thai7 ia7 si7 li2 chit8 lang5.
美麗的純情夢，無疑一時來斷送，因何離開著鄉村，無想阮一人。因為毋願交別人，才會心情如蔥蔥，陣陣暗風吹入窗，較想也是你一人。

bi2-le7 e5 sun5-cheng5-bang7, bo5-gi5 chit8-si5 lai5 tng7-sang3, in-ho5 li7-khui tioh8 hiong-chhoan, bo5 siunn7 gun2 chit8 lang5. in-ui7 m7 goan7 kau pat8-lang5, chiah e7 sim-cheng5 ju5-chhang2-chhang2, chun7-chun7 am3-hong chhoe jip8 thang, khah siunn7 ia7 si7 li2 chit8 lang5.
毋管環境變啥款，一片真情毋願放，黃昏夕陽照紗窗，等待也是你一人。
m7-koan2 khoan5-keng2 pian3 siann2-khoan2, it phian3 chin-cheng5 m7 goan7 pang3, hong5-hun sek8-iong5 chiau3 se-thang, tan2-thai7 ia7 si7 li2 chit8 lang5.
你兄我弟相招來，相招來弄獅喔，大鑼大鼓喔鬧猜猜，若是弄著獅頭，腳步愛徛會在，弄著獅尾搖搖擺擺，弄獅功夫實在真厲害喔，弄獅的精神是逍遙佮自在。

li2-hiann-goa2-ti7 sio-chio lai5, sio-chio lai5 lang7-sai ou, toa7 lo5 toa7 kou2 ou lau7-chhai-chhai, na7 si7 lang7 tioh8 sai-thau5, kha-pou7 ai3 khia7 e7 chai7, lang7 tioh8 sai-be2 io5-io5-pai2-pai2, lang7-sai kang-hu sit8-chai7 chin li7-hai7--ou, lang7-sai e5 cheng-sin5 si7 siau-iau5 kah chu7-chai7.
三嬸婆仔看熱鬧喔，歡喜甲笑咍咍。三叔公仔舉著拐仔頭啊！看甲喙仔裂腮腮。掌聲砲聲鼓聲鬧猜猜，逐家相招欲來看弄獅。

sann chim2-po5-a2 khoann3 jiat8-nau7-ou, hoann-hi2 kah chhio3-hai-hai. sann chek-kong-a kiah8 tioh8 koai2-a2-thau5 ah! khoann3 kah chhui3-a2 lih8-sai-sai. chiang2-siann phau3-siann kou2-siann lau7-chhai-chhai, tak8-ke sio-chio beh lai5 khoann3 lang7-sai.
你兄我弟相招來，相招來弄獅喔，大鑼大鼓喔鬧猜猜，若是弄著獅頭，腳步愛徛會在，弄著獅尾搖搖擺擺，弄獅功夫實在真厲害喔，弄獅的精神是逍遙佮自在。

li2-hiann-goa2-ti7 sio-chio lai5, sio-chio lai5 lang7-sai ou, toa7 lo5 toa7 kou2 ou lau7-chhai-chhai, na7 si7 lang7 tioh8 sai-thau5, kha-pou7 ai3 khia7 e7 chai7, lang7 tioh8 sai-be2 io5-io5-pai2-pai2, lang7-sai kang-hu sit8-chai7 chin li7-hai7--ou, lang7-sai e5 cheng-sin5 si7 siau-iau5 kah chu7-chai7.
三嬸婆仔看熱鬧喔，歡喜甲笑咍咍。三叔公仔舉著拐仔頭啊！看甲喙仔裂腮腮。掌聲砲聲鼓聲鬧猜猜，逐家相招欲來看弄獅。

sann chim2-po5-a2 khoann3 jiat8-nau7-ou, hoann-hi2 kah chhio3-hai-hai. sann chek-kong-a kiah8 tioh8 koai2-a2-thau5 ah! khoann3 kah chhui3-a2 lih8-sai-sai. chiang2-siann phau3-siann kou2-siann lau7-chhai-chhai, tak8-ke sio-chio beh lai5 khoann3 lang7-sai.
我就是青春的快車的小姐，無論是風颱時抑是落雨天，每早起坐火車為人來服務，輕鬆來唱出著甘蜜的歌聲。

goa2 chiu7-si7 chheng-chhun e5 khoai3-chhia e5 sio2-chia2, bo5-lun7 si7 hong-thai si5 iah8 si7 loh8-hou7-thinn, mui2 cha2-khi2 che7 hoe2-chhia ui7 lang5 lai5 hok8-bu7, khin-sang lai5 chhiunn3 chhut tioh8 kam-bit8 e5 koa-siann.
我就是青春的快車的小姐，無論是風颱時抑是落雨天，每早起坐火車為人來服務，輕鬆來唱出著甘蜜的歌聲。

goa2 chiu7-si7 chheng-chhun e5 khoai3-chhia e5 sio2-chia2, bo5-lun7 si7 hong-thai si5 iah8 si7 loh8-hou7-thinn, mui2 cha2-khi2 che7 hoe2-chhia ui7 lang5 lai5 hok8-bu7, khin-sang lai5 chhiunn3 chhut tioh8 kam-bit8 e5 koa-siann.
我就是青春的快車的小姐，無論是風颱時抑是落雨天，每早起坐火車為人來服務，輕鬆來唱出著甘蜜的歌聲。

goa2 chiu7-si7 chheng-chhun e5 khoai3-chhia e5 sio2-chia2, bo5-lun7 si7 hong-thai si5 iah8 si7 loh8-hou7-thinn, mui2 cha2-khi2 che7 hoe2-chhia ui7 lang5 lai5 hok8-bu7, khin-sang lai5 chhiunn3 chhut tioh8 kam-bit8 e5 koa-siann.
下昏暗的天氣實在真青，無代誌逐家來去趣味。無定會撞著一个西施，笑起來親像哈囉起鐵，大哥大我有兩支（兩支）聽好送伊一枝。

e7-hng-am3 e5 thinn-khi3 sit8-chai7 chin chheng, bo5 tai7-chi3 tak8-ke lai5-khi3 chhu3-bi7. bo5-tiann7 e7 long3 tioh8 chit8 e5 se-si, chhio3--khi2-lai5 chhin-chhiunn7 ha-lo5-khi2-thih, toa7-ko-toa7 goa2 u7 nng7 ki (nng7 ki) theng3-ho2 sang3 i chit8 ki.
一聲喂電視毋通看規暝，看久會近視耶，來去吹風較舒適，大聲哈，逐家招招攏來去，笑容若開機耶，其實快樂免開錢。

chit8 siann oe7 tian7-si7 m7-thang khoann3 kui-me5, khoann3 ku2 e7 kin7-si7 ia5, lai5-khi3 chhoe-hong khah su3-si3, toa7-siann ha, tak8-ke chio-chio long2 lai5-khi3, chhio3-iong5 na7 khui-ki ia5, ki5-sit8 khoai3-lok8 bian2 khai-chinn5.
笑一个無笑就用攁胝，獻一个嘛是會當減肥，定定笑快樂就有規堆，免開錢。
chhio3 chit8 e5 bo5 chhio3 to7 iong7 ngiau-chiunn7, hian3 chit8 e5 ma7 si7 e7 tang3 kiam2-pui5, tiann7-tiann7 chhio3 khoai3-lok8 chiu7 u7 kui-tui, bian2 khai-chinn5.
